text: Utan don, swa us mycel þearf is, habban us a on gemynde þone timan, þe us toweard is.
Ðonne se earma lichama and seo sawel hi todælað, þonne us forlætað ealle ure weoruldfreond and nede scylon: ne magon hy us þonne ænige gode, ac bið æt gode anum gelang eal, hwæt we gefaran scylon.
Him symle sy lof and wuldor in ealra worulda woruld a butan ende, amen.
